{{cpp/ranges/join_view/navbar}}

{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++20|1=
/*iterator*/() requires std::default_initializable&lt;OuterIter&gt; &amp;&amp;
                        std::default_initializable&lt;InnerIter&gt; = default;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++20|1=
constexpr /*iterator*/( Parent&amp; parent, OuterIter outer );
}}
{{dcl|num=3|since=c++20|1=
constexpr /*iterator*/( /*iterator*/&lt;!Const&gt; i )
    requires Const &amp;&amp;
             std::convertible_to&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;V&gt;, OuterIter&gt; &amp;&amp;
             std::convertible_to&lt;ranges::iterator_t&lt;InnerRng&gt;, InnerIter&gt;;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Constructs an iterator.

@1@ Default constructor. [[cpp/language/value initialization|Value-initializes]] the underlying iterators, and initializes the pointer to parent {{lc|ranges::join_view}} with {{c|nullptr}}.

@2@ Initializes the underlying {{rlpi|/#Data members|outer_}} iterator with {{c|std::move(outer)}}, and the pointer to parent {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{c|std::addressof(parent)}}; then calls {{rlpf|satisfy}}.

@3@ Converts {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;}} to {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;true&gt;}}. Move constructs the underlying iterators {{rlpi|/#Data members|outer_}} with {{c|std::move(i.outer_)}}, {{rlpi|/#Data members|inner_}} with {{c|std::move(i.inner_)}}, and underlying pointer to parent {{rlpi|/#Data members|parent_}} with {{c|i.parent_}}.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|parent|a (possibly const-qualified) {{lc|ranges::join_view}}}}
{{par|outer|an iterator into (possibly const-qualified) {{c|ranges::iterator_t&lt;Base&gt;}}}}
{{par|i|an {{c|/*iterator*/&lt;false&gt;}}}}
{{par end}}
